name: Orchard (itch) (Ethan Heimer)
description:
Become the strongest in the land. Destroy enemies and travel through 3 different biomes while you collect items and apples along the way. Unlock various hats and craft and combine different sword parts that will make you powerful

Follow me on Instagram for info about upcoming games and updates https://www.instagram.com/ethan.h.gamedev/?hl=en

Tip: Graphics settings can be changed in settings by pressing the 'ESC' key
